presentation.title: Strategic Technological Implementation for Enhanced NLP Efficiency

content.title: Project Overview: Objectives and Models
content.body: Overview of the project's aim to enhance NLP document classification efficiency with models like Gemini and Qwen. Key objectives include optimizing local fine-tuning.
image_prompts: a vibrant digital representation of artificial intelligence networks intertwining with diverse models and algorithms, futuristic and sleek design, showcasing innovation in technology, don't include text in image

content.title: Accuracy Comparison: Model Performance
content.body: The comparison showcases accuracy across models: Gemini-2.0 Flash at **85%**, Qwen1.5-110B at **69%**, and Qwen2.5-VL-3B at **42%**. It highlights Gemini's superior performance.

body.heading: Gemini-2.0 Flash
body.description: Provides the highest accuracy at **85%**, showing strong performance across various document categories.

body.heading: Qwen1.5-110B
body.description: Achieves **69%** accuracy, performing well but with room for improvement.

body.heading: Qwen2.5-VL-3B
body.description: Lowest accuracy at **42%**, highlighting limitations in document classification.

content.title: Training Cost Analysis: GPU Options
content.body: Analysis of training costs for local fine-tuning: Google Colab's T4 GPU is cost-effective but slow, while AWS EC2 V100 offers faster performance at higher costs.

body.heading: Gemini-2.0 Cost Efficiency
body.description: **TBD** for both **120** and **600**-image runs.

content.title: Benefits of Local Fine-tuning
content.description: Local fine-tuning significantly reduces inference costs, enhances operational efficiency, and ensures data security by limiting client data exposure to external APIs.

body.heading: Cost Reduction
body.description: Minimizes inference costs by implementing models locally using commodity GPUs.

body.heading: Operational Efficiency
body.description: Streamlines document classification processes by reducing reliance on external APIs.

body.heading: Data Security
body.description: Enhances data protection by minimizing exposure of sensitive client information.

content.title: Ongoing Fine-tuning Efforts
content.description: Details on the continuous model improvement for document processing across languages and various document types, focusing on enhancing the Qwen model's performance and capabilities.

body.heading: Model Improvement
body.description: Continuous adaptations for English and Chinese, improving accuracy and reliability.

body.heading: Document Scope Expansion
body.description: Enhancing capabilities for 30+ internal document types.

body.heading: Performance Enhancement
body.description: Qwen model modifications for billing classification accuracy.

content.title: Roadmap for Future Enhancements
content.description: Outline the upcoming developments focusing on model expansion, performance, and cost reduction. Includes expanding model coverage and deploying optimized models for cost efficiencies.

body.heading: Coverage Expansion
body.description: Strategically broaden model coverage across diverse document categories.

body.heading: Performance Optimization
body.description: Deploy models with enhanced performance, tailored to specific needs.

body.heading: Cost Reduction Strategies
body.description: Implement comprehensive plans to minimize operational costs while maintaining efficiency.

body.heading: Core Technologies
body.description: Adopt and integrate new core technologies to enhance system capabilities with a focus on efficiency.

body.heading: Local Models Deployment
body.description: Implement and deploy models locally to significantly reduce operational costs.

body.description: Effective distribution of resources to technology and development teams for optimal productivity and innovation.

content.description: Outline the immediate actionable steps focusing on technology adoption, team coordination for training cost evaluation, and system deployment strategies.
